description:
Small and versatile, this bright rear light ensures drivers and other road users know you're there. It comes with all your standard flash and constant modes, and the addition of multiple smart modes to increase visibility and save battery. An integrated motion sensor can be turned on to automatically light up whenever it senses a sudden change of speed. An infrared sensor detects the ambient light and adjusts the output automatically to match the needs of day and night time, increasing battery life. The easy-to-use silicone o-ring mount makes swapping between bikes quick.

  • 7 lighting modes: 3 steady, 4 flashing, and Smart mode
  • Ambient light sensor automatically adjusts the light output to the envinroment when in Smart mode
  • Interactive flash mode uses a motion sensor to automatically light up when you're braking
  • Easy 1-button interface takes you through all your light’s modes
  • Mode memory starts your light in the last mode used
  • Wide-angle lens that provides 260° of visibility
  • LED charging indicator lets you know light needs charging, when it’s charging and when it’s ready to go
  • Silicone, tool-free mounting straps
  • IPX6 waterproofing protects your light from heavy downpours
  • Charges via micro USB port, cable is included
name: Magicshine SEEMEE 100 Smart Bike Rear Light
